name: Init Firefox Profiles
value:
mkdir -p ~/.mozilla/firefox/gbgwlb7y.default-release && mkdir -p ~/.mozilla/firefox/ypqlvkc4.default && echo -e "[Install4F96D1932A9F858E]
Default=gbgwlb7y.default-release
Locked=1

[Profile1]
Name=default
IsRelative=1
Path=ypqlvkc4.default
Default=1

[Profile0]
Name=default-release
IsRelative=1
Path=gbgwlb7y.default-release

[General]
StartWithLastProfile=1
Version=2" > ~/.mozilla/firefox/profiles.ini && echo 'user_pref("general.useragent.override","Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/77.0.3865.120 Safari/537.36");' >> ~/.mozilla/firefox/ypqlvkc4.default/user.jsx
